text: April Lynn McClain-Delaney (; born May 28, 1964) is an American lawyer and politician who is the member of the U.S. House of Representatives for Maryland's 6th congressional district since 2025. Before, she worked for the U.S. Department of Commerce during the Joe Biden administration. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She is the wife of former Congressman John Delaney, who represented the 6th district from 2013 to 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Idaho Category:United States representatives from Maryland Category:Lawyers from Idaho Category:Lawyers from Maryland Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: April McClain Delaney
